name: Open Graph, Google Plus/Schema.org, Twitter Card Tags for WordPress
author: Team Heateor

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to insert:

  • Facebook Open Graph Meta Tags for efficient Facebook sharing
  • Twitter Card tags for more effective Twitter sharing
  • Meta Description and Schema.org tags for more effective Google sharing results

Feature list

  • Compatible with Gutenberg Editor
  • Facebook Open Graph Meta Tags
  • Twitter Card tags
  • Google Plus/Schema.org tags
  • Option to automatically purge Facebook Open Graph Meta Tags cache whenever you update/publish a post/page
  • Compatible with WordPress SEO by Yoast plugin
  • Compatible with SubHeading plugin
  • Compatible with Business Directory Plugin plugin
  • Compatible with BuddyPress, BBPress, WooCommerce
  • Supports HTTPS enabled websites
  • 24/7 quickest support

What makes this plugin Stand Out from others?

  1. Free: Yea, right. It is a free plugin. You need not pay single penny to use the features of this plugin.
  2. No Need to Register Anywhere: You do not need to create account at our website to use this plugin.
  3. Absolutely Simple: Plugin configuration is kept dead simple.
  4. Lightweight Code: Our developers follow best coding practices to ensure efficient loading and performance.
  5. We are committed to provide best quality among other similar plugins. If you find our plugin is lacking some feature, you can email us and we will do our best to include that feature in our plugin as soon as possible.
  6. Our support team is working 24/7 to answer your queries and assist you. You will find us the quickest to respond.

Important links

  • About Us: https://www.heateor.com
  • Our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/Heateor
  • Our Twitter Profile: https://twitter.com/Heateor
  • Support Documentation: http://support.heateor.com
  • Add-Ons: https://www.heateor.com/add-ons

You can provide your feedback at hello[at]heateor[dot]com
sections.installation:
Installation

  • Download the plugin from this page
  • Navigate to Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin page in admin panel of your website
  • Click Upload, click Choose file, upload the plugin zip and click Install Now button
  • Activate the plugin when installation is complete

Configuration

After installing and activating the plugin, you will see Open Graph Meta Tags in the left sidebar in your website admin panel.
There is help available with each option. You can see the help text by clicking the ? icon before each option.

How much do you charge for the plugin?

This plugin is FREE to download and feel free to use it on your WordPress, BuddyPress, BBPress and any other WP based systems. For advanced features and custom solutions, drop an email at support[at]heateor[dot]com

Can you help me set up the plugin at my website?

Yes, we can help you with it. Just drop an email at support[at]heateor[dot]com
sections.faq:

This plugin is FREE to download and feel free to use it on your WordPress, BuddyPress, BBPress and any other WP based systems. For advanced features and custom solutions, drop an email at support[at]heateor[dot]com

sections.changelog:
1.1.11

  • [Improvement] Performance improvement
  • [Improvement] Admin UI improvement
  • [Improvement] Updated Facebook JS SDK being used throughout the plugin to the latest version 17.0

1.1.10

  • [Improvement] Performance improvement
  • [Improvement] Updated Facebook JS SDK being used throughout the plugin to the latest version 16.0

1.1.9

  • [Bugfix] Plugin was causing problems when editing the pages and posts in the admin area in some cases

1.1.8

  • [New] Added new filter “heateor_ogmt_fb_og_url” to customize the url being captured by the og:url meta tag
  • [Improvement] Admin UI compatibility fixes for WordPress 5.5
  • [Improvement] Updated Facebook JS SDK being used throughout the plugin to the latest version 9.0

1.1.7

  • [Improvement] Admin UI compatibility fixes for WordPress 5.1
  • [Improvement] Admin UI improvement

1.1.6

  • [Improvement] Plugin admin UI is compatible with WordPress version 4.7

1.1.5

  • [Bugfix] <br/> tag was appearing with meta tags in a few cases
  • [Improvement] “Network Activate” is now activating the plugin with default options on subsites in multisite network
  • [Improvement] New subsites created in multisite network will have default options

1.1.4

  • [Bugfix] ‘summary_large’ was being used for twitter:card tag, instead of ‘summary_large_image’ (thanks @tlync)

1.1.3

  • [Improvement] Weird looking white line was appearing below the active tab at plugin options page in admin area

1.1.2

  • [Improvement] Admin UI improvement

1.1.1

  • [Bugfix] Twitter tweet was not showing correct image, in a few cases

1.1

  • [Bugfix] “Default image for image meta tags” option was not working properly
  • [Bugfix] Image meta tags were not appearing at homepage
  • [Bugfix] PHP notices were being generated for a couple of options at plugin options page, after saving the plugin settings

1.0

  • Initial release of the plugin
sections.screenshots:
1. Plugin Options Page: Tons of options, FREE

  2. Meta Tags: Meta tags in HTML source of website
sections.reviews:
works great, especially for Facebook meta's

By freeradio on February 4, 2023

great work, helping a lot with the Facebook Meta's

nice tools -efficient support

By maggiau on April 12, 2021

Thank you for your tools. simple to use and your help was quick and efficient :-)

So far, so good

By ohgoodiee on June 3, 2020

Still testing, but so far, fb picks up all of the tags without issue.

Astra Theme fix

By Sławomir Szczudłowski (masterrogp) on April 6, 2020

Looks like Astra theme did not send all Open Graph properties. This one small plugin fix all my problems. Great Job!

conflict with DIVI

By Avantart on March 15, 2019

There is a conflict with DIVI 3.2.1 which creates blank screen with with posts in single mode, not in blog mode I don't know anymore except that I spent hours to identify this conflict and I had to deactivate the plugin

Perfect! works great, THANK YOU!

By xarelix on October 25, 2018

Perfect companion to the "sassy social share" plugin also by Heateor Thank you so much! Love this plugin!

First time to rate

By millendra on June 8, 2018

I've been meaning to give this 5 to them. This is my first time rating a plug in. I've had encountered plug ins in the past that I'd like to give a one but figured it isn't worth it my time. With these guys, I'm willing to spend extra time because the plug in is so easy to use and they have the feature I want for free from another Social Sharing Plug in. Kudos to these devs.

It Works

By seyidipo on February 7, 2017

The plugin is fantastic and so simple. With it I have been able to fix some issues I was having.

Easiest Integration

By haiticu on October 17, 2016

Great plugin. Found it very easy to integrate meta tags and Twitter card tags at my website. Highly recommended.

Quite nice, I should know it: It's a fork of my plugin

By Marco Almeida | Webdados (webdados) on October 11, 2016

I would like to thank Heateor, "a creative team with unique ideas in mind" (their words), for forking our plugin Facebook Open Graph, Google+ and Twitter Card Tags (although no credits whatsoever were made regarding our original work), and thus trully inspiring us to make a new version, using also their "unique" ideas, in the spirit of GPL, but giving them the deserved credit in the spirit of civism, integrity and the WordPress way of doing things.

short_description: Optimizes social share by inserting Facebook Open Graph, Google Plus/Schema.org, Twitter Card and Other Meta Tags in HTML source.
